maps.title: Phase 1
maps.description: Identify locations in our highway system that need improvement based on traffic, safety, and economic data. Locations are prioritized based on the number of people who will benefit from the project and the amount of congestion that will be alleviated.

maps.title: Phase 2
maps.description: Gather bids, select a contractor, and begin construction. Projects in this phase are funded by the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT). Duration of construction varies by project.

maps.title: Phase 3
maps.description: Quality assurance, final inspection, and project closeout. Once opened to traffic, additional data is collected to determine the effectiveness of the project.
